artist: Roy Lichtenstein; Printer: Gemini G.E.L., Los Angeles; Publisher: Gemini G.E.L., Los Angeles
creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
markings:
LLC, in pencil: A/P III
LRC, publisher's blindstamp: c (inside a circle) and (Gemini symbol inside a circle)
medium: Color lithograph and line-cut with embossing on handmade paper
provenance: The artist (1970-1997, sold directly to Mersky); Mary and Robert Mersky, Minneapolis (1997- 2012), given to MIA, 2012.
signed: bottom edge, in pencil: Roy Lichtenstein '70
title: Modern Head #2
